definitions.text: accept (someone) to be what is claimed or accept his power and authority
examples: The Crown Prince was acknowledged as the true heir to the throne
We do not recognize your gods

definitions.text: be fully aware or cognizant of

examples: The fleeing convicts were picked out of the darkness by the watchful prison guards
I can't make out the faces in this photograph
The Regents officially recognized the new educational institution

definitions.text: express obligation, thanks, or gratitude for
examples: We must acknowledge the kindness she showed towards us

definitions.text: exhibit recognition for (an antigen or a substrate)

examples: My work is not recognized by anybody!
The best student was recognized by the Dean
